import React, { useState } from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import LikePostModal from '../modal/LikePostModal' import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive' import Modal from '../util/Modal' import styles from './PostCounter.module.css' const PostCounter = ({post}) => { const isDesktop = useMediaQuery({ query: '(min-width: 1224px)' }) const [isShowModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); return (
setShowModal(true)} className={styles.btn}>{post.likes.length>0 && `${post.likes.length} likes`}
{post.comments.length>0 && `${post.comments.length} comments`}
{post.shares.length>0 && `${post.shares.length} shares`}
{isShowModal && ReactDOM.createPortal( , portal)}
) } export default PostCounter
